Headline: #94 California Temporary Southbound Reroute near California/Fullerton
ShortDescription: Southbound 94 California  buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Fullerton, Milwaukee, and California due to, street blockage near California/Fullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California  buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Fullerton, Milwaukee, and California due to, street blockage near California/Fullerton.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Richmond
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, and 47th due to, street blockage at 47th/Richmond.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, and 47th due to, street blockage at 47th/Richmond.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Southbound Reroute near 54th/Ellis
ShortDescription: SB 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Ellis, 54th, Greenwood, 55th, and Ellis due to, street blockage near 54th/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Ellis, 54th, Greenwood, 55th, and Ellis due to, street blockage near 54th/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #97 Skokie Temporary Westbound Reroute near Oakton/Kenton
ShortDescription: WB 97 Skokie buses are temporarily rerouted via Oakton, Kenton, Kenny, Skokie, and Oakton due to, street blockage near Oakton/Kenton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #97 Skokie buses are temporarily rerouted via Oakton, Kenton, Kenny, Skokie, and Oakton due to, street blockage near Oakton/Kenton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Headline: No Trains Between Belmont and California
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Belmont and California due to a loss of power.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Belmont and California due to a loss of power.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Belmont, and,
  • between Forest Park and California, only.

Shuttle buses will available to provide connecting service through the affected area.  

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #77 Belmont and #56 Milwaukee buses.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
